remarks: The domain of the matrix multiplication function.  (Contributed by AV, 10-Feb-2019.)
statement:
mamudm.e $e |- E = ( R freeLMod ( M X. N ) ) $.
mamudm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` E ) $.
mamudm.f $e |- F = ( R freeLMod ( N X. P ) ) $.
mamudm.c $e |- C = ( Base ` F ) $.
mamudm.m $e |- .X. = ( R maMul <. M , N , P >. ) $.
mamudm $p |- ( ( R e. V /\ ( M e. Fin /\ N e. Fin /\ P e. Fin ) ) -> dom .X. = ( B X. C ) ) $.
